00007 #include "viterbi.h"
00008 
00009 // for MSVC
00010 #undef max
00011 
00012 namespace MeCab {
00013 
00014 #ifdef _VITERBI_WITH_ALL_PATH
00015 bool Viterbi::connectWithAllPath(size_t pos, Node *rNode) {
00016 #else
00017   bool Viterbi::connectNormal(size_t pos, Node *rNode) {
00018 #endif
00019     for (;rNode; rNode = rNode->bnext) {
00020       register long bestCost = 2147483647;
00021 
00022       Node* bestNode = 0;
00023 
00024       for (Node *lNode = end_node_list_[pos]; lNode; lNode = lNode->enext) {
00025 #ifdef _VITERBI_WITH_ALL_PATH
00026         register int  lcost = connector_->cost(lNode, rNode);  // local cost
00027         register long cost  = lNode->cost + lcost;
00028 #else
00029         register long cost  = lNode->cost + connector_->cost(lNode, rNode);
00030 #endif
00031 
00032         if (cost < bestCost) {
00033           bestNode  = lNode;
00034           bestCost  = cost;
00035         }
00036 
00037 #ifdef _VITERBI_WITH_ALL_PATH
00038         Path *path   = path_freelist_->alloc();
00039         path->cost   = lcost;
00040         path->rnode  = rNode;
00041         path->lnode  = lNode;
00042         path->lnext  = rNode->lpath;
00043         rNode->lpath = path;
00044         path->rnext  = lNode->rpath;
00045         lNode->rpath = path;
00046 #endif
00047       }
00048 
00049       // overflow check 2003/03/09
00050       CHECK_FALSE(bestNode) << "too long sentence.";
00051 
00052       rNode->prev = bestNode;
00053       rNode->next = 0;
00054       rNode->cost = bestCost;
00055       size_t x    = rNode->rlength + pos;
00056       rNode->enext = end_node_list_[x];
00057       end_node_list_[x] = rNode;
00058     }
00059 
00060     return true;
00061   }
00062 }
